name: vibe-language
description: Language support for Vibe - AI agent orchestration language

scripts.build: bun build src/extension.ts --outfile=out/extension.js --target=node --format=cjs --external=vscode && bun build src/server.ts --outfile=out/server.js --target=node --format=cjs
scripts.watch: bun build src/extension.ts --outfile=out/extension.js --target=node --format=cjs --external=vscode --watch & bun build src/server.ts --outfile=out/server.js --target=node --format=cjs --watch
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:syntax
